headline: Has Ameren’s Recent Run Leave Limited Upside After Mixed Valuation Signals?
summary: If you are wondering whether Ameren is still a sensible buy after its recent run up, or if most of the upside is already priced in, this breakdown will help you consider whether the current share price matches the company’s long term potential. The stock is up 1.4% over the last week and 12.2% year to date, but that follows a recent 5.8% pullback over the past month. This may have opened a window for value focused investors, despite the solid 14.0% gain over the past year and 48.1% over five...
